00025 void usage(const char *s) {
00026         cerr << "usage:\n" << s
00027                         << "[<cam number>|<video file>]  [-m <model image>]\n";
00028         exit(1);
00029 }

00031 int main( int argc, char** argv )
00032 {
00033         CvCapture* capture = 0;
00034 
00035         //cvSetErrMode(CV_ErrModeParent);
00036 
00037         const char *captureSrc = "0";
00038 
00039         // parse command line
00040         for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00041                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-m") ==0) {
00042                         if (i==argc-1) usage(argv[0]);
00043                         modelFile = argv[i+1];
00044                         i++;
00045                 } else if (argv[i][0]=='-') {
00046                         usage(argv[0]);
00047                 } else {
00048                         captureSrc = argv[i];
00049                 }
00050         }
00051 
00052         if(strlen(captureSrc) == 1 && isdigit(captureSrc[0]))
00053                 capture = cvCaptureFromCAM( captureSrc[0]-'0');
00054         else 
00055                 capture = cvCaptureFromAVI( captureSrc ); 
00056 
00057         if( !capture )
00058         {
00059                 cerr <<"Could not initialize capturing from " << captureSrc << " ...\n";
00060                 return -1;
00061         }
00062 
00063         cout << "Instructions:\n" 
00064                 " 1 - present a textured planar object to the camera. \n"
00065                 " 2 - push space to freeze the image\n"
00066                 " 3 - if the frozen image makes a good model image, press 'y'.\n"
00067                 "     Otherwise, press space to restart the video and take another shot. \n";
00068 
00069         // Allocate the detector object
00070         planar_object_recognizer detector;
00071 
00072 
00073         // Train or load classifier
00074         if(!detector.build_with_cache(
00075                                 string(modelFile), // mode image file name
00076                                 400,               // maximum number of keypoints on the model
00077                                 32,                // patch size in pixels
00078                                 3,                 // yape radius. Use 3,5 or 7.
00079                                 16,                // number of trees for the classifier. Somewhere between 12-50
00080                                 3                  // number of levels in the gaussian pyramid
00081                                 ))
00082         {
00083                 // interactively acquire a model image
00084                 acquire_model(capture, detector);
00085         }
00086 
00087         // A lower threshold will allow detection in harder conditions, but
00088         // might lead to false positives.
00089         detector.match_score_threshold=.03f;
00090 
00091         const char *win = "Bazar";
00092 
00093         IplImage* display=0;
00094         IplImage*gray=0;
00095 
00096         cvNamedWindow(win, CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE);
00097 
00098 #ifdef WIN32
00099   struct timeb last, now;
00100   ftime(&last);
00101 #else
00102   struct timeval last, now;
00103   gettimeofday(&last,0);
00104 #endif
00105 
00106   int nbFrames=0;
00107         
00108         for(;;)
00109         {
00110                 IplImage* frame = 0;
00111 
00112                 // acquire image
00113                 frame = cvQueryFrame( capture );
00114                 if( !frame )
00115                         break;
00116 
00117                 // convert it to gray levels, if required
00118                 if (frame->nChannels >1) {
00119                         if( !gray ) 
00120                                 gray = cvCreateImage( cvGetSize(frame), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1 );
00121                         cvCvtColor(frame, gray, CV_RGB2GRAY);
00122                 } else {
00123                         gray = frame;
00124                 }
00125 
00126                 // run the detector
00127                 if (detector.detect(gray)) {
00128                 }
00129                 show_result(detector, frame, &display);
00130                 cvShowImage(win, display);
00131                 //cvShowImage(win, frame);
00132 
00133                 if (nbFrames==4) {
00134                         nbFrames=0;
00135 
00136       double duration;
00137 
00138 #ifdef WIN32
00139       ftime(&now);
00140       duration = ( double(( now.time-last.time ) * 1e4) 
00141                 +  double( now.millitm-last.millitm ) ) / 1e4;
00142 #else
00143       gettimeofday(&now,0);
00144       duration = double(now.tv_sec-last.tv_sec)
00145                + double(now.tv_usec-last.tv_usec)/1e6;
00146 #endif
00147 
00148                         last = now;
00149 
00150                         cout << "FPS: " << 5.0/duration << endl;
00151                 } else {
00152                         nbFrames++;
00153                 }
00154 
00155                 if( cvWaitKey(1) >= 0 )
00156                         break;
00157         }
00158 
00159         cvReleaseCapture( &capture );
00160         cvDestroyWindow(win);
00161 
00162         return 0;
00163 }
00164 
00165 void show_result(planar_object_recognizer &detector, IplImage *video, IplImage **dst)
00166 {
00167         if (*dst==0) *dst=cvCloneImage(video);
00168         else cvCopy(video, *dst);
00169 
00170         if (detector.object_is_detected) {
00171                 for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) {
00172 
00173                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00174                         if (match->inlier) {
00175                         cvCircle(*dst,
00176                                 cvPoint((int) (PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, 
00177                                                         int(match->image_point->scale), 0)),
00178                                         (int)(PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, 
00179                                                         int(match->image_point->scale), 0))),
00180                                 3, CV_RGB(0,255,0), -1, 8,0);
00181                         }
00182         }
00183         }
00184 }
00185 
00186 void acquire_model(CvCapture *capture, planar_object_recognizer &detector)
00187 {
00188 
00189         const char *win = "Bazar";
00190 
00191         cvNamedWindow(win, CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE);
00192 
00193         bool pause=false;
00194         IplImage *frame;
00195         IplImage *shot=0;
00196 
00197         bool accepted =false;
00198         while (!accepted) {
00199 
00200                 if (!pause) {
00201                         frame = cvQueryFrame(capture);
00202                         cvShowImage(win, frame);
00203                 }
00204 
00205                 int k = cvWaitKey(pause ? 50 : 1);
00206                 switch (k) {
00207                         case ' ': 
00208                                   pause = !pause; 
00209                                   if (pause) {
00210                                           if (shot) cvCopy(frame,shot);
00211                                           else shot = cvCloneImage(frame);
00212                                           cvShowImage(win, shot);
00213                                   }
00214                                   break;
00215                         case 'y':
00216                         case '\n': if (pause && shot) accepted=true; break;
00217                         case 'q': exit(0); break;
00218                 }
00219         }
00220 
00221         cvSaveImage(modelFile, shot);
00222         detector.build(shot, 400, 32, 3, 16, 3);
00223         detector.save(string(modelFile)+".classifier");
00224         cvReleaseImage(&shot);
00225 }
